General.Name: Cizzle Biotechnology Holdings PLC
General.Description: Cizzle Biotechnology Holdings Plc engages in development of an immunoassay test for the CIZ1B biomarker for the early detection of lung cancer. The company was formerly known as Cizzle Biotechnology Limited and changed its name to Cizzle Biotechnology Holdings Plc in May 2021. Cizzle Biotechnology Holdings Plc is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 60 Gracechurch Street, London, United Kingdom, EC3V 0HR

1.Name: Prof. Dawn  Coverley
1.Title: Founder, Chief Scientific Officer & Non-Exec. Director
